translated: Je suppose que c'est un peu bête.

original: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter could be said to remedy anything.
translated: La maturité est une amère déception pour laquelle aucun remède n'existe, à moins que l'on puisse dire que le rire remédie à quoi que ce soit.

original: You're leaving already?
translated: Tu pars déjà ?

original: Tom drank too much.
translated: Tom a trop bu.

original: I don't like to see you this way.
translated: Je n'aime pas te voir comme ça.

original: Let's listen to this cassette.
translated: Écoutons cette cassette.

original: Tom has made a good suggestion.
translated: Tom a fait une bonne suggestion.

original: She's a very nice girl.
translated: C'est une fille très gentille.

original: I promise I'll pay you back the money that I owe you before the end of the month.
translated: Je promets que je te rembourserai l'argent que je te dois avant la fin du mois.

original: Do you have any idea what happened?
translated: Tu as une idée de ce qu'il s'est passé ?

original: Harry is ashamed of having lied to Sally.
translated: Harry a honte d'avoir menti à Sally.

original: It will heal.
translated: Cela guérira.

original: They grow fruit here.
translated: Ils cultivent des fruits par ici.

original: You look Japanese.
translated: Tu as l'air japonais.

original: We need to save up.
translated: On doit économiser.

original: I can't focus on two things at the same time.
translated: Je n'arrive pas à me concentrer sur deux choses à la fois.

original: Give him a hug.
translated: Faites-lui un câlin !

original: "Superman" is showing at the movie theatre this month.
translated: "Superman" sort ce mois-ci au cinéma.

original: I'm pretty skint at the moment.
translated: Je suis plutôt fauché en ce moment.

original: I'm going out for a drink.
translated: Je sors prendre un verre.

original: It is fine today.
translated: C'est parfait aujourd'hui.

original: It's a risky proposition.
translated: C'est une proposition risquée.

original: Are you having fun?
translated: Est-ce que tu t'amuses ?

original: The doctor arrived in the nick of time.
translated: Le médecin arriva in extremis.

original: No, I don't understand Mrs. Kunze.
translated: Non, je ne comprends pas madame Kunze.

original: Thank you for your answer!
translated: Merci de votre réponse.

original: Why are you washing your hands?
translated: Pourquoi te laves-tu les mains ?

original: I spilled my drink.
translated: J'ai renversé ma boisson.

original: Weird.
translated: Étrange.

original: Why did you eat that?
translated: Pourquoi est-ce que tu as mangé ça ?

original: I can't tell you how happy I am that you've come to visit us.
translated: Je ne peux pas vous dire à quel point je suis heureux que vous soyez venus nous rendre visite.

original: You didn't see anything.
translated: Tu n'as rien vu.

original: It's cold, so I put on my jacket.
translated: Il fait froid. J'ai mis ma veste.

original: I have to be impartial.
translated: Je dois être impartial.

original: Where is it hidden?
translated: Où est-ce caché ?

original: I like my life right now.
translated: J'aime ma vie, en ce moment.

original: I thought it would be an opportunity for you to improve your French.
translated: J'ai pensé que ce serait une occasion pour vous d'améliorer votre français.

original: We're incorrect.
translated: Nous sommes fautifs.

original: It's very difficult to transport them overland, but simple to do so by sea.
translated: Il est difficile de les transporter par voie terrestre, mais facile de le faire par la mer.

original: I think that Tom lied to me.
translated: Je pense que Tom m'a menti.

original: Nobody was listening to us.
translated: Personne ne nous écoutait.

original: I have lived in many houses and slept in many beds throughout my life.
translated: J'ai habité beaucoup de maisons et dormi dans beaucoup de lits au cours de ma vie.

original: Why would you want to share this type of information with people you hardly know?
translated: Pourquoi voudrais-tu partager ce type d'information avec des gens que tu connais à peine ?

original: My father has already given up smoking and drinking.
translated: Mon père a déjà arrêté de fumer et de boire.

original: Tom was a model inmate.
translated: Tom fut un détenu exemplaire.

original: Draw a picture of yourself.
translated: Dessine-toi.

original: Who built this place?
translated: Qui a construit cet endroit ?

original: I'm gonna shoot him.
translated: Je vais le descendre.

original: You're coming at the wrong moment.
translated: Tu viens au mauvais moment.

original: I'm not sure that that's possible.
translated: Je ne suis pas sûre que ça soit possible.
